snippet: Mr. Buffett said he reduced Berkshire Hathaway’s stakes to generate cash for his $32 billion acquisition of Precision Castparts.
abstract: Warren E Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway sells some of its Goldman Sachs and Walmart shares during third quarter.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Buffett said he reduced Berkshire Hathaway’s stakes to generate cash for his $32 billion acquisition of Precision Castparts.

headline.print_headline: Buffett Sells Goldman Sachs and Walmart Shares
headline.main: Warren Buffett Sells Goldman Sachs and Walmart Shares
